altername_name: Bakumatsu Roman Dainimaku: Gekka no Kenshi: Tsuki ni Saku Hana, Chiri Yuku Hana
Bakumatsu Roman Daini Maku: Gekka no Kenshi: Tsuki ni Saku Hana, Chiri Yuku Hana: The Last Blade 2
name: The Last Blade 2
overview: The Last Blade 2 was originally released in Japan as an arcade fighting game titled Bakumatsu Roman Dainimaku: Gekka no Kenshi - Tsuki ni Saku Hana, Chiri Yuku Hana (幕末浪漫第二幕 月華の剣士 ～月に咲く華、散りゆく花～) on November 25, 1998. It was developed by SNK and is the sequel to The Last Blade.
